IN_GAME_HUD.text.message: Try out our new in-game HUD! Just press ALT+` when playing any game added to your scene via Game Capture.

UI_UPDATE_ANNOUNCEMENT.text.message: **Welcome to XBC 3.9!** We've a bunch of new features for you to try.

REQUEST_PERMISSION.text.message: One or more of your sources or extensions is requesting permission to execute scripts

PLUGINS_UPDATE.label.message: Updates for your plugins are available!

NEW_CRISP_MESSAGE.file.message: You've been sent a new file

IDENTIFY_GAMES.text.message: Help us identify the games you capture so we can provide better support.

WINDOWS_GAMEBAR.text.message: **Windows Game Mode** is enabled on your system. This may cause performance issues in your stream.

EXTENSION_RUNNING_IN_BACKGROUND.text.message: %name% is now running in the background. You may reconfigure its settings by clicking its gear [GEAR](ICON-GEAR) icon in the Extensions menu.
